post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I want to go somewhere. it does not have to be Blue Mountain. Let's go. Do not wait until the last minutes. thomas lee wrote: > Hello All... > > I like to suggest that we should have another Java picnic. > I had so much fun last time. > > My Suggestion > - Place Blue Mountain very near from Wasaga beach http://www.bluemountain.ca > We could move around > or Niagara falls for Mr Kim Joong Soo > about 1:30 - to 2 hours away from Toronto > If your home is in northbound, you save 20 to 30 mins > - Lunch : Kim Bob - we could order it > - Things to do : many water slides for different age group > kid water playing ground > hiking + Golf ???? > - Time : July 20th > > Put your name down if you are interested in. > Password 1 > > 
> Names         # of people
> ----------    --------------------------
> Thomas Lee    2 adults        1 teenager
> Spencer       2(or 1) adults  1 kid (5 yrs old)
> Brendan       2 adults        0 kid
> 
> 
>
>
post.title: RE: Another Picnic
